title: Lesson 7: How God Makes Us Right
description: Exploring how we are declared righteous by God's unmerited favor.

blocks.text: Justification means God declares us righteous, not because we earned it, but because Jesus paid our debt. This grace is entirely unmerited and sets us free from the pressure to perform for God's love.
For by grace you have been saved through faith. And this is not your own doing; it is the gift of God, not a result of works, so that no one may boast.
4.1 - How does relying on God's grace rather than your own works bring freedom to your life?
